harold.title: Harold
harold.description: A foundational long-form structure built around repeated scene beats, thematic exploration, and ensemble group games. Scenes evolve through heightening and callback, often weaving together by the end.

montage.title: Montage
montage.description: A flexible long-form format made up of multiple independent scenes connected by a loose theme, tone, or idea. Emphasizes variety, discovery, and fast transitions.

pretty_flower.title: Pretty Flower
pretty_flower.description: A pattern-based long-form format that alternates between grounded two-person scenes and recurring group games. The repetition of structure allows for clear heightening and playful experimentation.

the_hulk.title: The Hulk
the_hulk.description: A character-driven long-form format that begins with a grounded, realistic scene and repeatedly returns to it as emotional intensity and absurdity escalate. Each return amplifies what was previously restrained.

armando.title: Armando
armando.description: A narrative-driven long-form format inspired by a monologue. Scenes are grounded in personal stories or reflections and explore different perspectives, emotions, or interpretations of the same idea.
